summary: Completed frontend testing for 8 homepage changes. Fixed critical ScrollToTop bug. Most features working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Hero text 'Connecting Exceptional Talent...' is positioned below the video section (at Y=890px), not immediately visible on page load. User needs to scroll down past the video to see the hero text. This is by design but may affect UX.

issues: Minor: Canvas2D console warnings about 'willReadFrequently' from particle animations - non-blocking performance optimization

critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: ScrollToTop was not working due to CSS scroll-behavior:smooth conflicting with immediate scroll. Fixed by temporarily disabling smooth scroll during navigation.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Homepage features fully tested. ScrollToTop now works correctly. Chat widget uses local knowledge base (no external API). All navigation links verified.

tested_features.hero_text_visibility: PASS - Text is visible when scrolled into view, white text on dark background, positioned at Y=1238px (below video section)
tested_features.whatsapp_button_visible: PASS - Visible in bottom-right corner at position right=24px, bottom=24px
tested_features.whatsapp_button_link: PASS - Links to wa.me/919844110041 with prefilled message about Ad Astra
tested_features.chat_toggle_visible: PASS - Visible in bottom-left corner at position left=24px, bottom=24px
tested_features.chat_toggle_color: PASS - Orange color rgb(232, 96, 28) matching brand orange
tested_features.chat_panel_opens: PASS - Panel opens on click with welcome message
tested_features.chat_quick_actions: PASS - 4 quick action buttons visible (services, industries, contact, about)
tested_features.chat_quick_action_reply: PASS - Clicking quick action sends message and gets relevant bot reply
tested_features.chat_text_input: PASS - Typing message and pressing Enter sends it and gets bot reply with relevant content
tested_features.particle_woman_section: PASS - Section visible with orange particle silhouette and text 'India's Largest Women-Owned Recruitment Firm'
tested_features.leaders_message_section: PASS - Section shows 'A Word From Our Founders' with Jayanthi and Nirupama photos (both loaded) and full messages
tested_features.scroll_to_top_navigation: PASS - After fix, page scrolls to top on React Router navigation
tested_features.services_learn_more_links: PASS - All Learn More links navigate to /solutions
tested_features.navbar_order: PASS - Navbar shows Home, About, Find Talent, Find Jobs, Solutions, Industries, Impact, Careers, Blog in order

bug_fixed.issue: ScrollToTop not working - scroll position retained on React Router navigation
bug_fixed.root_cause: CSS scroll-behavior:smooth on html element was conflicting with window.scrollTo() call
bug_fixed.fix_applied: Modified ScrollToTop component to temporarily disable smooth scrolling during navigation by setting html.style.scrollBehavior='auto' before scrollTo and restoring after requestAnimationFrame
